  • Method Details

    • getImageSet

      public static BufferedImage[] getImageSet(String path, int numFrames, int tileSize)
      gets a number of frames from a given path and scales them to the given tile size path should look like "/Objects/Key/key" this function will look for key0.png, key1.png, key2.png, etc.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the image set
      numFrames - the number of frames in the image set
      tileSize - the size to scale the images to
      Returns:
      imageSet

    • preScaleImage

      public static BufferedImage preScaleImage(BufferedImage image, int width, int height)
      Pre-scales an image to the given width and height
      Parameters:
      image - buffered image
      width - of image
      height - of image
      Returns:
      new image

    • getDifficultySpeedBoost

      public static double getDifficultySpeedBoost()
      Gets the speed boost for the enemies based on the difficulty
      Returns:
      speed boost value
